name: mrtrix3

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
MRtrix provides a set of tools to perform various advanced diffusion MRI
analyses, including constrained spherical deconvolution (CSD),
probabilistic tractography, track-density imaging, and apparent fibre
density.

dependencies.name: eigen
dependencies.description:
Eigen is a C++ template library for linear algebra matrices, vectors,
numerical solvers, and related algorithms.

dependencies.name: fftw
dependencies.description:
FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier
transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and
of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the
discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST). We believe that FFTW, which
is free software, should become the FFT library of choice for most
applications.

dependencies.name: glu
dependencies.description: This package provides the Mesa OpenGL Utility library.

dependencies.name: libtiff
dependencies.description: LibTIFF - Tag Image File Format (TIFF) Library and Utilities.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
